name: AttributeScopes
desc: Collections of attributes that system frameworks define.

items.name: var foundation: AttributeScopes.FoundationAttributes.Type
items.desc: A property for accessing the attribute scopes that Foundation defines.

items.name: var swiftUI: AttributeScopes.SwiftUIAttributes.Type
items.desc: A property for accessing the attribute scopes that SwiftUI defines.

items.name: var uiKit: AttributeScopes.UIKitAttributes.Type
items.desc: A property for accessing the attribute scopes that UIKit defines.

items.name: var appKit: AttributeScopes.AppKitAttributes.Type
items.desc: A property for accessing the attribute scopes that AppKit defines.
